I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics and Data Science at Carnegie Mellon University. I am advised by Professors [Kathryn Roeder](http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~roeder/) and [Gene Katsevich](https://ekatsevi.github.io). Previously, I studied math and computer science at the University of Maryland, College Park.

**General interests** Statistics, machine learning, statistical genomics

**Current research** Gene transcription, genetic CRISPR screens
